GSD.description:
firmware: arm_scmi: Harden accesses to the reset domains

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit 8e65edf0d37698f7a6cb174608d3ec7976baf49e. For more details please see the references link.
